show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Descend into mental health hell with me and my companion psychologist Ty Colbert, PhD as he works under surrealistic… conditions with violent and seemingly deranged prisoners locked in cages and wearing plexiglass masks for their therapy hour.
  This is empathic therapy at its most challenging–and potentially at its most rewarding.
